entries.name: ydbm[key] → valueclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Return value associated with key from database.

entries.name: ydbm[key] = valueclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Set key to value in database.

entries.name: delete(key)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Deletes value from database associated with key.

entries.name: delete_if { |key, value| ... }click to toggle source
entries.desc: Calls the given block once for each key, value pair in the database. Deletes all entries for which the block returns true.

entries.name: each_pair { |key, value| ... }click to toggle source
entries.desc: Calls the given block once for each key, value pair in the database.

entries.name: each_value { |value| ... }click to toggle source
entries.desc: Calls the given block for each value in database.

entries.name: fetch( key, ifnone = nil )click to toggle source
has_value?(value)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if specified value is found in the database.

entries.name: index( keystr )
entries.desc: Deprecated, used #key instead.

entries.name: invert → hashclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a Hash (not a DBM database) created by using each value in the database as a key, with the corresponding key as its value.

entries.name: key(value) → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the key for the specified value.

entries.name: reject { |key, value| ... }click to toggle source
entries.desc: Converts the contents of the database to an in-memory Hash, then calls Hash#reject with the specified code block, returning a new Hash.

entries.name: replace(hash) → ydbmclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Replaces the contents of the database with the contents of the specified object. Takes any object which implements the #each_pair method, including Hash and DBM objects.

entries.name: shift → [key, value]click to toggle source
entries.desc: Removes a [key, value] pair from the database, and returns it. If the database is empty, returns nil.

entries.name: store(key, value) → valueclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Stores value in database with key as the index. value is converted to YAML before being stored.

entries.name: to_a → arrayclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Converts the contents of the database to an array of [key, value] arrays, and returns it.

entries.name: to_hash → hashclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Converts the contents of the database to an in-memory Hash object, and returns it.

entries.name: update(hash) → ydbmclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Updates the database with multiple values from the specified object. Takes any object which implements the #each_pair method, including Hash and DBM objects.

entries.name: valuesclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns an array of values from the database.

entries.name: values_at(*keys)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns an array containing the values associated with the given keys.

entries.name: each()
entries.desc: Alias for: each_pair
